name: FAnimNode_CCDIK
doc: Controller which implements the CCDIK IK approximation algorithm

EffectorLocation: Coordinates for target location of tip bone - if EffectorLocationSpace is bone, this is the offset from Target Bone to use as target location
EffectorTarget: If EffectorTransformSpace is a bone, this is the bone to use. *
Precision: Tolerance for final tip location delta from EffectorLocation
MaxIterations: Maximum number of iterations allowed, to control performance.
bStartFromTail: Toggle drawing of axes to debug joint rotation
bEnableRotationLimit: Tolerance for final tip location delta from EffectorLocation
RotationLimitPerJoints: symmetry rotation limit per joint. Index 0 matches with root bone and last index matches with tip bone.
LODThreshold:
* Max LOD that this node is allowed to run
* For example if you have LODThreshold to be 2, it will run until LOD 2 (based on 0 index)
* when the component LOD becomes 3, it will stop update/evaluate
* currently transition would be issue and that has to be re-visited
Alpha: Current strength of the skeletal control
